text: Gudmund Olav Restad (19 December 1937 – 18 September 2021) was a Norwegian politician. He was a member of the Norwegian Centre Party. He was Minister of Finance from 1997 to 2000. He was Mayor of Smøla from 1980 to 1985. He was a member of the Storting between 1985 until 2001. He was born in Skaun, Norway. Restad died on 18 September 2021 at the age of 83.Tidligere finansminister Gudmund Restad er død ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Norwegian politicians Category:Norwegian mayors
title: Gudmund Restad
